mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.CARBONKNOWLEDGE (PROCESSNO, PROCESSNAME, PROCESSTYPE, STATIONNAME) values (#{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stationname,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select PROCESSNO, PROCESSNAME, PROCESSTYPE, STATIONNAME from WISDOM.CARBONKNOWLEDGE
